Package Server.game.map

Class ShootingMap

java.lang.Object
Server.game.map.Map<ShootingCell>
Server.game.map.ShootingMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShootingMap extends Map<ShootingCell> implements Serializable
Represents a shooting map used by a player to track their shots. Each cell is a ShootingCell, which holds information about whether a cell was shot and aimed.
See Also:

    Description
    ShootingMap(int size)
    Constructs a new shooting map with the specified size.
    ShootingMap(ShootingMap other)
    Creates a deep copy of another ShootingMap, duplicating its cells.
